clang-analyzer-core.BitwiseShift.description: Finds cases where bitwise shift operation causes undefined behaviour.

clang-analyzer-core.CallAndMessage.description:
Check for logical errors for function calls and Objective-C message expressions
(e.g., uninitialized arguments, null function pointers).

clang-analyzer-core.NonNullParamChecker.description:
Check for null pointers passed as arguments to a function whose arguments are
references or marked with the ânonnullâ attribute.

clang-analyzer-core.NullDereference.description: Check for dereferences of null pointers.

clang-analyzer-core.StackAddressEscape.description: Check that addresses to stack memory do not escape the function.

clang-analyzer-core.UndefinedBinaryOpera.description: Check for undefined results of binary operators.

clang-analyzer-core.VLASize.description: Check for declarations of VLA of undefined or zero size.

clang-analyzer-core.uninitialized.ArrayS.description: Check for uninitialized values used as array subscripts.

clang-analyzer-core.uninitialized.Branch.description: Check for uninitialized values used as branch conditions.

clang-analyzer-core.uninitialized.Captur.description: Check for blocks that capture uninitialized values.

clang-analyzer-core.uninitialized.NewArr.description: Check if the size of the array in a new[] expression is undefined.

clang-analyzer-core.uninitialized.UndefR.description: Check for uninitialized values being returned to the caller.

clang-analyzer-cplusplus.ArrayDelete.description:
Reports destructions of arrays of polymorphic objects that are destructed as
their base class.

clang-analyzer-cplusplus.InnerPointer.description: Check for inner pointers of C++ containers used after re/deallocation.

clang-analyzer-cplusplus.NewDelete.description:
Check for double-free and use-after-free problems. Traces memory managed by
new/delete.

clang-analyzer-cplusplus.NewDeleteLeaks.description: Check for memory leaks. Traces memory managed by new/delete.

clang-analyzer-cplusplus.PlacementNew.description:
Check if default placement new is provided with pointers to sufficient storage
capacity.

clang-analyzer-cplusplus.SelfAssignment.description: Checks C++ copy and move assignment operators for self assignment.

clang-analyzer-deadcode.DeadStores.description: Check for values stored to variables that are never read afterwards.

clang-analyzer-fuchsia.HandleChecker.description: A Checker that detect leaks related to Fuchsia handles.

clang-analyzer-nullability.NullPassedToN.description: Warns when a null pointer is passed to a pointer which has a _Nonnull type.

clang-analyzer-nullability.NullReturnedF.description:
Warns when a null pointer is returned from a function that has _Nonnull return
type.

clang-analyzer-nullability.NullableDeref.description: Warns when a nullable pointer is dereferenced.

clang-analyzer-nullability.NullablePasse.description: Warns when a nullable pointer is passed to a pointer which has a _Nonnull type.

clang-analyzer-nullability.NullableRetur.description:
Warns when a nullable pointer is returned from a function that has _Nonnull
return type.

clang-analyzer-optin.core.EnumCastOutOfR.description: Check integer to enumeration casts for out of range values.

clang-analyzer-optin.cplusplus.Uninitial.description: Reports uninitialized fields after object construction.

clang-analyzer-optin.cplusplus.VirtualCa.description: Check virtual function calls during construction/destruction.

clang-analyzer-optin.osx.cocoa.localizab.description: Check that NSLocalizedString macros include a comment for context.

Warns about uses of non-localized NSStrings passed to UI methods expecting
localized NSStrings.

clang-analyzer-optin.performance.GCDAnti.description: Check for performance anti-patterns when using Grand Central Dispatch.

clang-analyzer-optin.portability.UnixAPI.description: Finds implementation-defined behavior in UNIX/Posix functions.

clang-analyzer-optin.taint.TaintedAlloc.description:
Check for memory allocations, where the size parameter might be a tainted
(attacker controlled) value.

clang-analyzer-osx.API.description: Check for proper uses of various Apple APIs.

clang-analyzer-osx.NumberObjectConversio.description: Check for erroneous conversions of objects representing numbers into numbers.

clang-analyzer-osx.ObjCProperty.description: Check for proper uses of Objective-C properties.

clang-analyzer-osx.SecKeychainAPI.description: Check for proper uses of Secure Keychain APIs.

clang-analyzer-osx.cocoa.AtSync.description: Check for nil pointers used as mutexes for @synchronized.

clang-analyzer-osx.cocoa.AutoreleaseWrit.description:
Warn about potentially crashing writes to autoreleasing objects from different
autoreleasing pools in Objective-C.

clang-analyzer-osx.cocoa.ClassRelease.description: Check for sending âretainâ, âreleaseâ, or âautoreleaseâ directly to a Class.

clang-analyzer-osx.cocoa.Dealloc.description: Warn about Objective-C classes that lack a correct implementation of -dealloc.

clang-analyzer-osx.cocoa.IncompatibleMet.description: Warn about Objective-C method signatures with type incompatibilities.

clang-analyzer-osx.cocoa.Loops.description: Improved modeling of loops using Cocoa collection types.

clang-analyzer-osx.cocoa.MissingSuperCal.description: Warn about Objective-C methods that lack a necessary call to super.

clang-analyzer-osx.cocoa.NSAutoreleasePo.description: Warn for suboptimal uses of NSAutoreleasePool in Objective-C GC mode.

clang-analyzer-osx.cocoa.NilArg.description: Check for prohibited nil arguments to ObjC method calls.

clang-analyzer-osx.cocoa.NonNilReturnVal.description: Model the APIs that are guaranteed to return a non-nil value.

clang-analyzer-osx.cocoa.ObjCGenerics.description: Check for type errors when using Objective-C generics.

clang-analyzer-osx.cocoa.RetainCount.description: Check for leaks and improper reference count management.

clang-analyzer-osx.cocoa.RunLoopAutorele.description: Check for leaked memory in autorelease pools that will never be drained.

clang-analyzer-osx.cocoa.SelfInit.description: Check that âselfâ is properly initialized inside an initializer method.

clang-analyzer-osx.cocoa.SuperDealloc.description: Warn about improper use of â[super dealloc]â in Objective-C.

clang-analyzer-osx.cocoa.UnusedIvars.description: Warn about private ivars that are never used.

clang-analyzer-osx.cocoa.VariadicMethodT.description:
Check for passing non-Objective-C types to variadic collection initialization
methods that expect only Objective-C types.

clang-analyzer-osx.coreFoundation.CFNumb.description: Check for proper uses of CFNumber APIs.

clang-analyzer-osx.coreFoundation.CFReta.description: Check for null arguments to CFRetain/CFRelease/CFMakeCollectable.

clang-analyzer-osx.coreFoundation.contai.description: Checks for index out-of-bounds when using âCFArrayâ API.

Warns if âCFArrayâ, âCFDictionaryâ, âCFSetâ are created with non-pointer-size
values.

clang-analyzer-security.FloatLoopCounter.description:
Warn on using a floating point value as a loop counter (CERT: FLP30-C,
FLP30-CPP).

clang-analyzer-security.PutenvStackArray.description:
Finds calls to the putenv function which pass a pointer to a stack-allocated
(automatic) array as the argument. Function putenv does not copy the passed
string, only a pointer to the data is stored and this data can be read even by
other threads. Content of a stack-allocated array is likely to be overwritten
after exiting from the function.

clang-analyzer-security.SetgidSetuidOrde.description:
The checker checks for sequences of setuid(getuid()) and
setgid(getgid()) calls (in this order). If such a sequence is found and
there is no other privilege-changing function call (seteuid, setreuid,
setresuid and the GID versions of these) in between, a warning is
generated. The checker finds only exactly setuid(getuid()) calls (and the
GID versions), not for example if the result of getuid() is stored in
a variable.

clang-analyzer-security.cert.env.Invalid.description: Finds usages of possibly invalidated pointers.

clang-analyzer-security.insecureAPI.Depr.description: Warn on uses of unsecure or deprecated buffer manipulating functions.

clang-analyzer-security.insecureAPI.mkst.description: Warn when âmkstempâ is passed fewer than 6 Xâs in the format string.

clang-analyzer-security.insecureAPI.mkte.description: Warn on uses of the âmktempâ function.
